title.narrative: 3.1.KNOWLEDGE MANAGEMENT & CHILD POVERTY

description.narrative: Output 3.1: By the end of 2021, national and subnational capacities for data collection and analysis of the situation of child poverty, as well as evaluation of social programmes and policies are strengthened., which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Reducing Child Poverty, Reducing Child Poverty (Covid), Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 3: By the end of 2021, the most disadvantaged children benefit from enhanced evidence-based and integrated social protection and poverty reduction policies, programmes and institutions

participating-org.narrative: VEZARAT TAAVON KAR VA REFAHE EJTEMA

sector.narrative: Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty
Policy and strategy development and coordination
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration

title.narrative: Output 3.1: By the end of 2021, national and subnational capacities for data collection and analysis of the situation of childpoverty, as well as evaluation of social programmes and policies are strengthened.

description.narrative: CO continued to; provide technical support national and sub-national capacities for generation, dissemination and analysis of child welfare and poverty for informed decision making. Furthermore; CO continue to advocate for cross sectoral knowledge sharing and information sharing in partnerships with;;the Statistical Center of Iran as the sole custodian of official; data. During the reporting periord due to the political transition challanges faces to make progress beyond formation of a task force on multidimensional poverty.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/01/2022
